text: In UI Toolkit, what is the purpose of BindableElement?

options.text: It allows elements to be bound to data sources
It allows elements to be bound to event handlers
It allows elements to be bound to animations
It is a base class for all interactive UI elements

feedbackCorrect: The BindableElement class in UI Toolkit allows elements to be bound to data sources, such as variables or properties in your scripts, allowing them to automatically update to reflect changes in the underlying data.
feedbackIncorrect: The BindableElement class in UI Toolkit allows elements to be bound to data sources, such as variables or properties in your scripts. It is not primarily used to bind elements to event handlers or animations, nor is it a base class for all interactive UI elements.
